Megatron overheard the last part, and smiled. Yes, that's it, show your
fury Firestike, he thought to himself. I serve the cause, so must you,
but don't forget, I have become part of the cause, he continued to
think.

He turned around, and held out a hand. "I again apologize for my need to
open fire on you Firestrike, but if you had interfered, Shockwave would
never have joined us, and our power would not be absolute. But you serve
the cause, our Destiny, and that is all that is importan." He then
looked downcast. "But showing loyalty helps our cause, don't forget
that."
